issue.title: Components install check are useless and may fail (backend)
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Components install check are useless and may fail (backend).

* easySDI install only by package
* test are made in the CORE views, if we enter without passing the views, we don't have the value in session.
** incompatible with admin modules
** incompatible with #877
* fail in contact module: : the tab "request option" is not always visible, depending on administrator previous navigation path in backend.


**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0
